title: PEOPLESOFT FINANCIALS BRIEFLY UNAVAILABLE ON SUNDAY
body:
The following information was released by Case Western Reserve University:

Because of scheduled maintenance, PeopleSoft Financials will be unavailable for access on Sunday, Oct. 13th 
from 3 to 6 a.m.

Campus community users will be unable to create or approve requisitions, submit travel and expense reports, or 
complete other functions within the program during this time.

For assistance with any technology product or service at Case Western Reserve University, contact the University 
Technology [U]Tech Service Desk at help@case.edu or 216.368.HELP (4357) or visit help.case.edu.
